task_description: Facing the building to your West (approx. 291°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: The top of the target building is not visible in the current view, so I need to look up to see its full height before I can make an estimation.

Now that I can see the full height of the building from the ground to the roofline across the last two views, I can estimate its height by counting the floors; it appears to be about 8-9 stories tall, and assuming each story is roughly 3.5 meters, the total height is approximately 30 meters.
